alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Addison, southeastern Chittenden and southwestern Washington Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middlebury, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Middlebury, Northfield Village, Huntington, Warren, Ripton, Bristol, Northfield, Duxbury, Waterbury Village, Moretown, Lincoln, Waitsfield, Berlin, Fayston, Starksboro, Buels Gore, New Haven, Bolton, Weybridge and Roxbury. This includes Interstate 89 near mile marker 48, and between mile markers 61 and 71. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison
